section.p: You hear the shouts from outside, muffled by the swirling sulphurous fog. A stab of icy panic pulses at your heart, and an instant later the door bursts open. Three militiamen armed with maces burst through the doorway. Behind them, a tall cadaverous gentleman wrapped in a cape is stamping in fury.
‘A thief in my house!’ he rages. ‘Do your duty!’
You realise the truth: Lauria has used you as a decoy to cover her escape. You’ll get even later - if you survive.

The militiamen race forward to seize you.
Make a COMBAT roll at a Difficulty of 12 .
